main event: A brilliant flash observed in the sky over Chinnampo, Korea on 10 March 1951.
interesting points: The object appeared as a heavy flak burst and was described as having varied colors., It was initially seen as a reddish yellow glow followed by a blush-white burst., Witnesses included military personnel who reported the flash at about 3 o'clock high., The object did not deviate from its trajectory and emitted no sound., The duration of the sighting was very short, approximately 2 seconds.
